DOC.brief_summary: This study measure plasma half-life 25-hydroxyvitamin D3 ( 25 ( OH ) D3 ) non-pregnant-non-lactating woman , pregnant woman 30 wk gestational age 3 month post-partum woman exclusively breast-feeding .
DOC.criteria: All participant : Currently resident West Kiang plan stay next 5 month Aged 18 45 Pregnancy : > 20 wk < 30 wk pregnant ( gestational age assessment ultrasound ) Singleton fetus Lactation : Breast feed All participant : Severe anaemia ( haemoglobin < 7 g/dL ) ( per ENID protocol ) Known sickle cell anaemia Known asthmatic allergic peanut ( already exclude ENID ) Known history liver , kidney , gut malabsorption problem Other chronic condition On prescription medication Taking vitamin D supplement ( > 200 IU/d ) Broken bone last 3 Recent infection illness ( 2 week prior start study period ) Reported onset menopause ( already exclude ENID ) Malaria parasitemia ( prior study period ) Unable consent Pregnant : Pregnancyrelated complication discretion midwife Known HIV positive Lactation : Health problem mother infant may affect feeding practice
